LABEL: 0x2A2
STRING: And so, we headed to the theater room.

LABEL: 0x2DC
STRING: As we walked through the ship, I suddenly wondered what had happened to the Nomura sisters after that.

LABEL: 0x43D
STRING: Reiri and Touri had dashed out of the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x469
STRING: She'd said she wanted to talk to Touri alone, but what in the world about?

LABEL: 0x4B9
STRING: Seemed like it wasn't just Yukari who was hiding things.

LABEL: 0x50D
STRING: I barely knew what the twin sisters, especially Reiri, were thinking.

LABEL: 0x563
STRING: Not only that, but I didn't even know what they were doing at this very moment...

LABEL: 0x62F
STRING: ――However.

LABEL: 0x649
STRING: I could do nothing but keep quiet, seeing Yukari's brooding face in front of me.

LABEL: 0x6A3
STRING: There was no need to add to our worries right now when she was about to open up to us.

LABEL: 0x70D
STRING: Thinking along those lines, we arrived at the theater room.

LABEL: 0x7D4
STRING: I entered the room unprepared.

LABEL: 0x804
STRING: The moment I stepped into the darkness, I was assaulted by a sensation akin to my ears shutting off.

LABEL: 0x84E
STRING: It was reminiscent of entering a movie theater or boarding an airplane.

LABEL: 0x886
STRING: And even though it was called a theater room, it was more like a planetarium than a movie theater.

LABEL: 0x900
STRING: Although there wasn't a full spherical screen here, the imaging technology far surpassed the average planetarium.

LABEL: 0x958
STRING: The most distinctive feature here was the display.

LABEL: 0x98A
STRING: Though it was inferior to the one in the sunken observation deck in the rear section, it had an overwhelming field of view.

LABEL: 0x9DA
STRING: Even the floor we were standing on was a part of it.

LABEL: 0xA2E
STRING: The pixel count had been increased to the maximum possible, and it incorporated naked-eye 3D technology to create a sense of perspective.

LABEL: 0xA90
STRING: In addition, it had excellent audio equipment with speakers placed everywhere in the theater.

LABEL: 0xAE4
STRING: By reproducing the sound waves throughout the whole room, this was the most realistic acoustic space in history.

LABEL: 0xB3C
STRING: This was the best stage above ground or underwater for experiencing the best science, technology, image, and sound had to offer.

LABEL: 0xB82
STRING: In other words, an audiovisual experience like no other――

LABEL: 0xC3F
STRING: ――Only...

LABEL: 0xC57
STRING: It was all silent now.

LABEL: 0xC83
STRING: This room could only slowly wait for its own demise here without anyone having had the chance to experience it.

LABEL: 0xCE7
STRING: Yukari, Hiragino, Tokiwa, and me.

LABEL: 0xD0D
STRING: Confirming that the four of us were all present, Yukari closed the door.

LABEL: 0xDBB
STRING: 「...I'll make it a little brighter.」

LABEL: 0xDE6
STRING: She rolled up her sleeve as she spoke and held up her bracelet.

LABEL: 0xE24
STRING: The sensors that were no doubt somewhere in this hemispherical space detected it, and the display reacted.

LABEL: 0xE86
STRING: ――And then, a moment later...

LABEL: 0xF05
STRING: We were in the sea.

LABEL: 0xF2D
STRING: 「Ohhh...」

LABEL: 0xF47
STRING: We were surrounded by blue and azure.

LABEL: 0xF6D
STRING: The ceiling was brighter than what was below our feet, and the further down you went, the darker it became.

LABEL: 0xFC1
STRING: It was just like we were standing in the midst of rocking waters.

LABEL: 0x1005
STRING: I couldn't breathe for a moment and felt like choking.

LABEL: 0x1045
STRING: This wasn't the deep sea 700 meters deep we were trapped in.

LABEL: 0x1099
STRING: It was the sea most people generally imagined when hearing the word, which was at a depth of 100 meters at most.

LABEL: 0x10D5
STRING: This beauty was certainly touching, but...

LABEL: 0x1112
STRING: 「Can't you switch the image to something else, Momoi?」

LABEL: 0x114A
STRING: 「I feel like I'm getting sick...」

LABEL: 0x1181
STRING: The swaying blue sea was unsettling for some reason.

LABEL: 0x11C5
STRING: Just as Hiragino said, a sensation welled up inside me as if I'd gotten seasick.

LABEL: 0x121C
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x123C
STRING: 「I'll switch it to something else right away.」

LABEL: 0x1271
STRING: As she spoke, Yukari raised her bracelet-clad arm and sent a signal.

LABEL: 0x12BF
STRING: The sensors picked it up, and the scene changed.

LABEL: 0x134E
STRING: ――We were thrown into the darkness.

LABEL: 0x1380
STRING: At the bottom of empty darkness.

LABEL: 0x139E
STRING: No.

LABEL: 0x13B2
STRING: There was no bottom. It was a void.

LABEL: 0x13F6
STRING: We were in the middle of nothingness, where the concept of "darkness" didn't exist.

LABEL: 0x142E
STRING: What was this――

LABEL: 0x144C
STRING: 【The primordial universe――】

LABEL: 0x146C
STRING: 【It is said that after an event called the Big Bang, this universe where we live was born.】

LABEL: 0x14D8
STRING: It had been a while since I'd heard POL's voice.

LABEL: 0x14FD
STRING: Still... This voice seemed familiar after all...

LABEL: 0x154B
STRING: However, the imagery before me was more important than treading through my memories right now.

LABEL: 0x1589
STRING: Was Yukari trying to convey something to us?

LABEL: 0x15B9
STRING: 【...The dust and gas that had spread out in space gradually coalesced as they drew closer to each other.】

LABEL: 0x161F
STRING: 【This would later become our planet.】

LABEL: 0x1649
STRING: The video progressed along with POL's explanation.

LABEL: 0x16DF
STRING: Gas gradually gathered and swirled in the empty space.

LABEL: 0x171F
STRING: Time accelerated, and the vortex of dust eventually grew in size and density.

LABEL: 0x1763
STRING: Before I knew it, it had turned into a rock. A planet.

LABEL: 0x179D
STRING: And then, our point of view descended.

LABEL: 0x1826
STRING: As if drawn by gravity, we landed on the brightly burning Earth.

LABEL: 0x186E
STRING: This was the Earth, covered in lava right after its birth.

LABEL: 0x18A8
STRING: Its surface was swelling.

LABEL: 0x18C2
STRING: Lava was boiling.

LABEL: 0x18DA
STRING: It was a gargantuan rock that was nothing more than a burning lump of lava. The Earth.

LABEL: 0x191C
STRING: While we were marveling at the sight, falling meteorites appeared one by one,

LABEL: 0x195E
STRING: becoming increasingly bigger.

LABEL: 0x1984
STRING: As the meteorites collided with the surface, dust, gas, and water vapor were created.

LABEL: 0x19CE
STRING: The particles, so fine that they couldn't be seen with the naked eye, remained in the air and eventually covered the Earth.

LABEL: 0x1A28
STRING: That gave rise to the atmosphere, and huge clouds emerged in the sky.

LABEL: 0x1A60
STRING: And before long, falling from the clouds...

LABEL: 0x1A8C
STRING: Rain poured down to the Earth.

LABEL: 0x1AAE
STRING: A never-ending rain.

LABEL: 0x1ACA
STRING: It whittled away at the burning surface,

LABEL: 0x1AE8
STRING: and flowed from high to low ground.

LABEL: 0x1B1C
STRING: And with that came...

LABEL: 0x1B91
STRING: ――The sea.

LABEL: 0x1BA7
STRING: Dark and blue.

LABEL: 0x1BBF
STRING: With nothing in it.

LABEL: 0x1BD7
STRING: The sea... was created.

LABEL: 0x1C06
STRING: 「I know this is sudden, Katagiri-san, but...」

LABEL: 0x1CEB
STRING: I was captivated by the spectacle unfolding before me,

LABEL: 0x1D35
STRING: but Yukari's words brought me back to reality.

LABEL: 0x1D68
STRING: 「Yesterday, Hiragino-sensei talked about the definition of evolution.」

LABEL: 0x1DB1
STRING: 「Now that you mention it...」

LABEL: 0x1DD1
STRING: I answered vaguely.

LABEL: 0x1DED
STRING: Now that she mentioned it, we might have talked about that yesterday.

LABEL: 0x1E99
STRING: 「Do you remember what it is, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x1EFE
STRING: I was thrown off by her sudden question.

LABEL: 0x1F20
STRING: The three conditions required for "evolution"...

LABEL: 0x2019
STRING: 「The definition of "evolution."」

LABEL: 0x2039
STRING: 「Evolution, namely――」

LABEL: 0x205B
STRING: 「Mutations among individuals.」

LABEL: 0x2085
STRING: 「And the inheritance of said mutations.」

LABEL: 0x20AD
STRING: 「Those mutations act to give an advantage in survival and reproduction.」

LABEL: 0x2148
STRING: 「Following that sequence, their form and nature change.」

LABEL: 0x2176
STRING: 「That's what we call Darwinian evolution.」

LABEL: 0x21AF
STRING: While looking at the ancient Earth, which changed its aspects one after another,

LABEL: 0x21E7
STRING: Tokiwa responded as if she were reciting lines from a textbook she had memorized.

LABEL: 0x2237
STRING: Yukari nodded in satisfaction at her answer.

LABEL: 0x22D7
STRING: 「Exactly...」

LABEL: 0x22F5
STRING: 「Generally speaking, "evolution" based on natural selection is defined that way.」

LABEL: 0x2343
STRING: 「Of course, that's not all there is to evolution.」

LABEL: 0x2383
STRING: 「There are many other forms of it, such as molecular evolution that occurs even if there's no difference in survival advantage,

LABEL: Split3
STRING: and viral evolution that has been advocated in recent years.」

LABEL: 0x2407
STRING: 「However, what all of them have in common is...」

LABEL: 0x2439
STRING: 「The inheritance and accumulation of mutations from one generation to the next.」

LABEL: 0x2479
STRING: 「That's the foundation of "evolution."」

LABEL: 0x24E6
STRING: A mutation in only one individual in one generation was not evolution...

LABEL: 0x2528
STRING: Only when the changes had been passed down and inherited properly,

LABEL: 0x2566
STRING: could you call it that.

LABEL: 0x2596
STRING: I thought back to what I had heard yesterday.

LABEL: 0x262C
STRING: 「But――」

LABEL: 0x2648
STRING: 「There's a problem with this definition.」

LABEL: 0x267B
STRING: 「A problem...?」

LABEL: 0x2697
STRING: Yukari's unexpected words made me repeat them without thinking.

LABEL: 0x26CF
STRING: Only mutations that were properly passed down could be called evolution.

LABEL: 0x2711
STRING: If there was a problem with that, what was it...?

LABEL: 0x275A
STRING: 「"Mutations are hereditary"――」

LABEL: 0x2786
STRING: 「"Heredity" refers to DNA being copied and passed down to the next generation.」

LABEL: 0x27D9
STRING: 「However...」

LABEL: 0x27F5
STRING: 「Even the DNA for that should have been born as a product of evolution.」

LABEL: 0x2897
STRING: 「...Do you understand?」

LABEL: 0x28BB
STRING: 「When life was born, there was no such thing as "heredity."」

LABEL: 0x290E
STRING: If we called the inheritance of mutations evolution, then...

LABEL: 0x2942
STRING: Without heredity, there would be no evolution.

LABEL: 0x2970
STRING: However, the DNA responsible for heredity was born from evolution.

LABEL: 0x29AF
STRING: Which meant...?

LABEL: 0x2A3B
STRING: 「In other words...」

LABEL: 0x2A53
STRING: 「That definition of evolution only applies to life that has evolved to some degree.」

LABEL: 0x2B0D
STRING: 「So, what was life before that?」

LABEL: 0x2B4D
STRING: 「How did it evolve, and how did it end up in its current form?」

LABEL: 0x2BA7
STRING: 「And, in the first place...」

LABEL: 0x2BCD
STRING: 「This primordial life which we can trace back through the evolutionary lineage...」

LABEL: 0x2C0D
STRING: 「Where and in what form did it originate?」

LABEL: 0x2CBD
STRING: ――The image changed.

LABEL: 0x2CDB
STRING: By now, the place we were standing was at the complete bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x2D23
STRING: We were shrinking the deeper we went.

LABEL: 0x2D5B
STRING: We had gotten so small now that even the bubbles in the water looked massive.

LABEL: 0x2DA7
STRING: Then, right in front of our eyes, something appeared wrapped in a small membrane.

LABEL: 0x2DEF
STRING: 【It is said that primordial life was born in the sea.】

LABEL: 0x2E88
STRING: The membrane split.

LABEL: 0x2F01
STRING: From one to two.

LABEL: 0x2F7C
STRING: From two to four.

LABEL: 0x2FF9
STRING: The small globes that were wrapped in the membrane split again and again into innumerable pieces.

LABEL: 0x30BB
STRING: 「Life was born on Earth four billion years ago.」

LABEL: 0x30EF
STRING: 「Then again――」

LABEL: 0x310D
STRING: 「No one knows if the first lifeforms really took on a shape like this.」

LABEL: 0x31CB
STRING: The images we were seeing were nothing more than a simulation based on a hypothesis.

LABEL: 0x322D
STRING: It was finely crafted, but it might have been a lie.

LABEL: 0x3261
STRING: No matter how correct the logic was, there was no telling if it was true or not.

LABEL: 0x32B0
STRING: 「Where was life born...?」

LABEL: 0x32DE
STRING: 「It's a question that yet remains unanswered.」

LABEL: 0x331F
STRING: Yukari turned around to face everyone and raised a finger.

LABEL: 0x342C
STRING: 「The famous Aristotle also mentioned something about the birth of life.」

LABEL: 0x3478
STRING: 「He advocated that life occurs spontaneously.」

LABEL: 0x34B0
STRING: 「It was in the 1860s that the spontaneous generation theory he advocated was decisively denied.」

LABEL: 0x34FC
STRING: 「Pasteur's controlled experiments with the "swan-neck bottle" showed us the following;」

LABEL: 0x3546
STRING: 「That organisms did not spontaneously arise from a carcass,」

LABEL: 0x3586
STRING: 「but that microscopic organisms were present in the air,」

LABEL: 0x35EE
STRING: 「and that they gathered on the carcass, causing it to decay.」

LABEL: 0x36B2
STRING: 「The most enjoyable moment of the "swan-neck bottle" experiment was,」

LABEL: 0x36F6
STRING: 「most likely,」

LABEL: 0x3710
STRING: 「the moment when the neck of the flask was snapped off.」

LABEL: 0x379F
STRING: 「For you and Tokki.」

LABEL: 0x37DB
STRING: 「And 40 years later...」

LABEL: 0x37FB
STRING: 「In 1906, Arrhenius asked himself a question.」

LABEL: 0x3835
STRING: 「"If life can't be born from within nature, then where did the primogenitor come from?"」

LABEL: 0x3891
STRING: 「And, his answer was...」

LABEL: 0x38C6
STRING: 「――"Life came from outer space."」

LABEL: 0x3955
STRING: The so-called panspermia theory.

LABEL: 0x398E
STRING: 「I'm surprised you know.」

LABEL: 0x39B7
STRING: 「I heard about it a long time ago.」

LABEL: 0x39E5
STRING: 「...Nee-san told me.」

LABEL: 0x3A7B
STRING: 「...Is that so?」

LABEL: 0x3AA0
STRING: When I mentioned my sister, Yukari made a pained expression.

LABEL: 0x3AE2
STRING: She hadn't told me anything about it yet, but I wondered what had happened between Yukari and her.

LABEL: 0x3B3C
STRING: ...I wondered if she would ever tell me about it.

LABEL: 0x3BE2
STRING: 「Katagiri-san's right.」

LABEL: 0x3C06
STRING: 「As we've seen from the footage so far, there was nothing but inorganic matter on the newborn Earth.」

LABEL: 0x3C5E
STRING: 「However, it's organic matter that forms the basis of life...」

LABEL: 0x3C9C
STRING: 「Could something so complex really be born naturally on this planet?」

LABEL: 0x3CF0
STRING: 「So, Arrhenius proposed the theory that it came from the outside.」

LABEL: 0x3D40
STRING: 「His theory... a "hypothesis," if you will, was a big one.」

LABEL: 0x3D82
STRING: 「And it still hasn't been completely denied yet.」

LABEL: 0x3DD5
STRING: 「It's the world of cosmic horror.」

LABEL: 0x3E60
STRING: 「Or Cos-Ho for short.」

LABEL: 0x3E9D
STRING: 「The theory of chemical evolution advocated against that theory.」

LABEL: 0x3ED9
STRING: 「――In other words, the claim that organic matter, the essence of life, was born from inorganic matter that emerged in 1953.」

LABEL: 0x3F3D
STRING: 「According to the Miller-Urey experiment...」

LABEL: 0x3F6D
STRING: 「When lightning struck the primordial atmosphere, organic amino acids were created.」

LABEL: 0x3FC5
STRING: 「Nevertheless, the experiment was based on very limiting suppositions.」

LABEL: 0x401B
STRING: 「It wouldn't be possible without an atmosphere rich in ammonia.」

LABEL: 0x4061
STRING: 「With no ammonia, it'd be impossible to make a lot of organic matter...」

LABEL: 0x40AF
STRING: 「And over the years, it became clear that there was very little ammonia in the Earth's atmosphere back then.」

LABEL: 0x420D
STRING: 「Momoi...」

LABEL: 0x4236
STRING: 「What is it, sensei?」

LABEL: 0x42D0
STRING: 「Sorry to interrupt you while you're explaining, but...」

LABEL: 0x436F
STRING: 「Um, what are you getting at?」

LABEL: 0x43A6
STRING: Hiragino asked her while scratching his head.

LABEL: 0x43D4
STRING: He probably had the least interest in the deep sea out of us all.

LABEL: 0x4414
STRING: I wasn't actively interested in the subject, either.

LABEL: 0x444A
STRING: I had been listening to my sister's stories as if they were lullabies, so I seemed to have deep-sea knowledge ingrained in my brain...

LABEL: 0x4524
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x453F
STRING: Yukari opened her mouth wide and froze in place.

LABEL: 0x457D
STRING: She didn't seem to understand what he just said.

LABEL: 0x4614
STRING: After a short while, her cheeks flushed red like she had realized something.

LABEL: 0x4661
STRING: 「Ah, sorry...」

LABEL: 0x4685
STRING: 「I got a little too carried away there.」

LABEL: 0x46EE
STRING: Ahem.

LABEL: 0x4704
STRING: Yukari coughed softly to cover up her embarrassment.

LABEL: 0x472C
STRING: Based on that familiar explanation we had heard in the observation deck as well, she must be a deep-sea otaku, after all.

LABEL: 0x478E
STRING: She hid her slightly blushing cheeks and began talking again.

LABEL: 0x4832
STRING: 「As you see, there are many theories about the origin of life.」

LABEL: 0x4876
STRING: 「However...」

LABEL: 0x4892
STRING: 「I believe that the origin lies in the sea.」

LABEL: 0x48D0
STRING: 「At the very bottom...」

LABEL: 0x48F8
STRING: 「In the depths of the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x4931
STRING: The origin of life, the bottom of the sea, a sunken ship...

LABEL: 0x495D
STRING: I was finally starting to understand what she was talking about.

LABEL: 0x49F7
STRING: 「There are many factors that we need to take into account in order to uncover the mysteries of life's origin.」

LABEL: 0x4A53
STRING: 「The probability of atomic life occurring above all...」

LABEL: 0x4A93
STRING: 「Namely, the abundance of energy that life can utilize.」

LABEL: 0x4AD1
STRING: 「The elements required... The quantity and adequacy for organic matter to be synthesized in a non-living manner.」

LABEL: 0x4B15
STRING: 「In addition to those, the likelihood of survival of the atomic life that has been created...」

LABEL: 0x4B61
STRING: 「In other words, the persistence and stability of energy and elemental supply.」

LABEL: 0x4B9F
STRING: 「And finally, consistency with the evolutionary record of Earth and life...」

LABEL: 0x4BDB
STRING: 「Whether or not the results are consistent with the climate and topography of the Earth at the time and with the fossils and other proof of the existence of life.」

LABEL: 0x4C41
STRING: 「The hypothesis that ammonia must be present in large quantities for it to be viable is fundamentally weak.」

LABEL: 0x4CA1
STRING: 「When you put all of this together,

LABEL: 0x4CC9
STRING: the most likely origin of life...」

LABEL: 0x4D13
STRING: 「...Are the hydrothermal vents in the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x4D50
STRING: 「Hydrothermal vents...」

LABEL: 0x4DDA
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x4E0F
STRING: Hiragino was mumbling to himself.

LABEL: 0x4E33
STRING: And Yukari followed up on it.

LABEL: 0x4F20
STRING: 「As the name suggests, it's a spot where geothermally heated seawater gushes out.」

LABEL: 0x4F68
STRING: 「...Let's talk specifics.」

LABEL: 0x4F96
STRING: 「In 1976, an undersea thermal vent was discovered off the coast of Galapagos.」

LABEL: 0x4FDC
STRING: 「Three years later, in 1979...」

LABEL: 0x5004
STRING: 「High-temperature hydrothermal vents were detected in the Pacific Ocean...」

LABEL: 0x5036
STRING: 「Their temperature was 340 degrees Celsius.」

LABEL: 0x50D5
STRING: Was the temperature of the water blowing out from the center of the Earth really that high?

LABEL: 0x5119
STRING: I heard someone gasping for breath, which was probably Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x514E
STRING: 「Those high-temperature hydrothermal vents drew a lot of attention, of course.」

LABEL: 0x519A
STRING: 「An investigation team was dispatched, in fact. And...」

LABEL: 0x51C8
STRING: 「That's where they were.」

LABEL: 0x51EC
STRING: 「Swarming tubeworms.」

LABEL: 0x5253
STRING: At Yukari's signal, the image of Earth's history was interrupted.

LABEL: 0x5293
STRING: And then, a moment later...

LABEL: 0x53FD
STRING: 「Aaaahh...」

LABEL: 0x542B
STRING: Tokiwa let out a voice like she was enchanted.

LABEL: 0x5459
STRING: She wiggled and twisted her upper body, making charming noises.

LABEL: 0x55AC
STRING: 「They're always so cuuute!」

LABEL: 0x565F
STRING: 「This one,

LABEL: 0x56F6
STRING: and this one,

LABEL: 0x578B
STRING: and that one too!」

LABEL: 0x580B
STRING: 「They're so pretty I can't help myself!」

LABEL: 0x5856
STRING: There she goes again.

LABEL: 0x5882
STRING: I wondered if she could see something different from us...

LABEL: 0x5938
STRING: 「Hmhm.」

LABEL: 0x5952
STRING: 「Do you like them too, Tokiwa-san?」

LABEL: 0x59EE
STRING: 「Yes!」

LABEL: 0x5A5B
STRING: 「Of course!」

LABEL: 0x5B2B
STRING: 「Is there anyone who doesn't?」

LABEL: 0x5B62
STRING: 「It's the duty of every citizen, nay, earthling, to love the Burgess monsters!」

LABEL: 0x5BB9
STRING: The Burgess monsters.

LABEL: 0x5BE1
STRING: A group of bizarre creatures that lived during the Cambrian era.

LABEL: 0x5C5D
STRING: The image returned to the screen.

LABEL: 0x5C9B
STRING: There was a tube-shaped creature with eleven pairs of arms and legs.

LABEL: 0x5CCF
STRING: A fish with a long mouth and five eyes.

LABEL: 0x5CFA
STRING: There were arthropods with five pairs of legs full of stings.

LABEL: 0x5D29
STRING: All of them were creatures that had actually existed on this Earth.

LABEL: 0x5D6F
STRING: They were more sinister looking than the demons in our imagination,

LABEL: 0x5DAD
STRING: created with no sensibility at all.

LABEL: 0x5DE1
STRING: Something felt off about them.

LABEL: 0x5DFF
STRING: Even so, I could tell instinctively.

LABEL: 0x5E2F
STRING: That these grotesque things were still clearly living beings.

LABEL: 0x5EDF
STRING: 「...Hehehe.」

LABEL: 0x5F00
STRING: Yukari laughed softly as she gazed at the ominous group of creatures.

LABEL: 0x5F42
STRING: It wasn't the same mushy emotional expression that Tokiwa had, but...

LABEL: 0x5F7A
STRING: Her sincere, appreciating smile looked almost maniacal in its own way.

LABEL: 0x5FD5
STRING: 「You might be right.」

LABEL: 0x6005
STRING: 「Come to think of it, when I was still young...」

LABEL: 0x602F
STRING: 「Maybe I'm the person I am today because I met these guys.」

LABEL: 0x607A
STRING: Her tone was as composed as before, but...

LABEL: 0x60B0
STRING: There was a smile she couldn't hide on her lips.

LABEL: 0x60F5
STRING: 「It's strange, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x6117
STRING: 「I can't believe creatures like this used to live on this planet.」

LABEL: 0x6161
STRING: 「They existed not in a dream, but in reality...」

LABEL: 0x619D
STRING: 「How do you like them?」

LABEL: 0x6220
STRING: 「Cute, right?」

LABEL: 0x628F
STRING: Ummm...

LABEL: 0x62A7
STRING: That wasn't a joke... was it?

LABEL: 0x62E9
STRING: Both Yukari and Tokiwa stared at the display in a trance.

LABEL: 0x6321
STRING: Honestly... I didn't get it.

LABEL: 0x63A8
STRING: Hiragino and I exchanged a glance and nodded vaguely.

LABEL: 0x64C3
STRING: 「They're the best.」

LABEL: 0x64DD
STRING: 「I put models of these babies all over my lab.」

LABEL: 0x659A
STRING: 「But then, I realized it wasn't my lab and just left them like that.」

LABEL: 0x6604
STRING: 「I used to have stuffed animals of them that I slept with.」

LABEL: 0x6651
STRING: I wondered what mine were of...

LABEL: 0x66AB
STRING: Still, Yukari sleeping with a stuffed animal cradled in her arms...

LABEL: 0x66E5
STRING: I couldn't imagine it.

LABEL: 0x6703
STRING: Did they sell stuffed animals like that in the first place?

LABEL: 0x673F
STRING: The producers sure had a lot of courage to release them...

LABEL: 0x6784
STRING: 「...Why do they have such a strange shape?」

LABEL: 0x67D1
STRING: She spoke quietly.

LABEL: 0x6863
STRING: 「The sea is a treasure trove of life.」

LABEL: 0x6887
STRING: 「I believe it was in the sea that life first appeared on Earth.」

LABEL: 0x68DA
STRING: The reason she was in the sea.

LABEL: 0x68FA
STRING: The reason she was here.

LABEL: 0x692B
STRING: 「I've always been fascinated by the evolution of life.」

LABEL: 0x6965
STRING: 「The advocates of creation myths claim that all the tens of millions of species were created by the work of God.」

LABEL: 0x69C5
STRING: 「To me, it seems more like a divine miracle to think that this diversity was guided solely by the providence of nature.」

LABEL: 0x6A39
STRING: 「"Darwin's Theory of Evolution."」

LABEL: 0x6A61
STRING: 「In 1859, he "defeated" God and paved the way for rational pursuit.」

LABEL: 0x6AAF
STRING: 「I'm still in awe of the magnificence of his ideas.」

LABEL: 0x6AF3
STRING: 「...Yesterday, Touri mentioned the Heike crabs.」

LABEL: 0x6B37
STRING: 「A crab with a human face is an incredibly strange creature.」

LABEL: 0x6B71
STRING: 「But, even such seemingly bizarre traits have a reason for existing.」

LABEL: 0x6BBB
STRING: 「...And if that's the case, what's the reason for the appearance of these lifeforms?」

LABEL: 0x6C0F
STRING: 「And for what reason did they exist?」

LABEL: 0x6C50
STRING: I didn't know...

LABEL: 0x6C6C
STRING: A reason for needing five eyes.

LABEL: 0x6C8D
STRING: A reason for having twenty legs.

LABEL: 0x6CB1
STRING: We, who lived in the present, couldn't imagine them in the slightest.

LABEL: 0x6CED
STRING: However, they did exist.

LABEL: 0x6D89
STRING: 「Then again, even if their forms were optimal for their time period...」

LABEL: 0x6DC9
STRING: 「They don't exist anymore.」

LABEL: 0x6E52
STRING: 「They're extinct.」

LABEL: 0x6EA4
STRING: 「Various causes have been discussed as to why.」

LABEL: 0x6F2D
STRING: 「But even though there're many theories, what it comes down to is...」

LABEL: 0x6F77
STRING: 「That they weren't adaptable.」

LABEL: 0x6FA3
STRING: 「In other words, they were no match for "other creatures."」

LABEL: 0x6FE2
STRING: The struggle for existence.

LABEL: 0x6FFA
STRING: Eat or be eaten.

LABEL: 0x7020
STRING: Even after their long struggle for survival, they had now disappeared...

LABEL: 0x70D4
STRING: 「In the fierce competition for survival, many forms of life are born and lost.」

LABEL: 0x7122
STRING: 「Very few creatures exist today that still retain their original form.」

LABEL: 0x7178
STRING: 「However...」

LABEL: 0x7194
STRING: 「There are places where things that have existed since time immemorial and have retained their forms continue to live on.」

LABEL: 0x7206
STRING: 「And that's... the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x722F
STRING: That was why Yukari was here.

LABEL: 0x725D
STRING: She took a deep breath.

LABEL: 0x72EB
STRING: 「To me, the deep sea is something I admire.」

LABEL: 0x7319
STRING: 「I'm certain that the origin of life is there.」

LABEL: 0x734B
STRING: 「There must be a starting point left in the deep sea,

LABEL: 0x738B
STRING: a branching point in one of the evolutionary paths that led us to humanity...」

LABEL: 0x73BD
STRING: 「To where we are now...」

LABEL: 0x73F1
STRING: 「Ever since I was a child, I've had a vague yearning for the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x7432
STRING: Ever since she was a child...

LABEL: 0x74B1
STRING: Hearing her story reminded me of my sister.

LABEL: 0x74ED
STRING: By the time I could remember, her room was dyed the color of the sea.

LABEL: 0x752D
STRING: I was sure that Yukari was the same way.

LABEL: 0x7565
STRING: Although, she and my sister were nothing alike...

LABEL: 0x7668
STRING: 「When I was in university...」

LABEL: 0x768E
STRING: 「Through a professor's help, I was introduced to ROMLES, to which I now belong to.」

LABEL: 0x76D8
STRING: 「That was nine years ago when I was 19 years old.」

LABEL: 0x7709
STRING: 「For some time after that, I went to ROMLES to continue my university research.」

LABEL: 0x776C
STRING: 「Research?」

LABEL: 0x778A
STRING: 「What kind of research was that?」

LABEL: 0x77D7
STRING: Tokiwa spoke up suddenly.

LABEL: 0x77F9
STRING: She was leaning toward Yukari.

LABEL: 0x7823
STRING: As a physicist, she must be interested.

LABEL: 0x7926
STRING: 「It was about magnetosomes.」

LABEL: 0x7950
STRING: 「I was studying the life patterns of deep-sea bacteria with magnetosomes here in Kurama Bay.」

LABEL: 0x79D1
STRING: 「Hmm, hmm...」

LABEL: 0x7A15
STRING: 「Could you go into a little more detail...?」

LABEL: 0x7A57
STRING: 「――Let's save that for another time.」

LABEL: 0x7A87
STRING: 「Can we hear the rest of the story?」

LABEL: 0x7AC2
STRING: 「R-Right...」

LABEL: 0x7AFF
STRING: I forced my way in and corrected the course of the conversation.

LABEL: 0x7B33
STRING: If we went along with Tokiwa's request now, it would take hours...

LABEL: 0x7B93
STRING: Tokiwa seemed to be in shock when I glanced at her.

LABEL: 0x7BCF
STRING: It was pretty surreal to see her go rigid with that look on her face the moment she was interrupted.

LABEL: 0x7C48
STRING: 「The turning point came exactly seven years ago.」

LABEL: 0x7C80
STRING: 「――We were allowed to dive into this sea for research.」

LABEL: 0x7CE3
STRING: What――

LABEL: 0x7CF9
STRING: ――I felt like we were approaching something important.

LABEL: 0x7D29
STRING: Yukari nodded and began to tell the rest.

LABEL: 0x7DC7
STRING: 「Even researchers who have worked at ROMLES for a long time rarely get to ride a deep-sea submarine.」

LABEL: 0x7E1F
STRING: 「Not to mention, for a university student like me, it was an unbelievably big role to take.」

LABEL: 0x7E91
STRING: 「That's when I boarded that submarine together with her.」

LABEL: 0x7F22
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x7F3C
STRING: 「It was your sister.」

LABEL: 0x7F83
STRING: ――I see.

LABEL: 0x7FA1
STRING: So that's how it was, after all.

LABEL: 0x7FC7
STRING: There was no longer any surprise.

LABEL: 0x7FE5
STRING: There was just a feeling of being close to the truth that sharpened my nerves.

LABEL: 0x802D
STRING: I remembered the tears Yukari had shown me inside this dark theater room earlier.

LABEL: 0x8134
STRING: 「His... sister?」

LABEL: 0x815E
STRING: 「Which means, at that time――」

LABEL: 0x81A3
STRING: 「...That's right.」

LABEL: 0x81C6
STRING: Yukari turned to me with a meek expression.

LABEL: 0x8205
STRING: 「Your sister died in that accident back then.」

LABEL: 0x8264
STRING: A deep-sea submarine accident.

LABEL: 0x8284
STRING: The death of my sister.

LABEL: 0x829E
STRING: I didn't think I'd be able to hear about it from the people involved.

LABEL: 0x82DA
STRING: I clenched my trembling hands.

LABEL: 0x8348
STRING: 「Please... tell me.」

LABEL: 0x8372
STRING: 「What happened to my sister?」

LABEL: 0x839E
STRING: However, Yukari looked away hesitantly.

LABEL: 0x843E
STRING: 「...I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x8464
STRING: 「That's top secret information even within ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x84B1
STRING: That was also what the men back then had said.

LABEL: 0x84ED
STRING: They told me about my sister's death, but they never told me the reason.

LABEL: 0x85AF
STRING: 「I couldn't talk about it, no matter what.」

LABEL: 0x85EF
STRING: 「Besides, I couldn't believe you really were her brother.」

LABEL: 0x8686
STRING: 「I couldn't trust you... I couldn't be sure.」

LABEL: 0x86D5
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x86F1
STRING: 「You have no choice but to believe me.」

LABEL: 0x8715
STRING: I had faked my name and rewritten the program.

LABEL: 0x8747
STRING: My actions must have made her suspicious of me.

LABEL: 0x8787
STRING: The deception I used to try and get closer to the truth had backfired... I couldn't regret it enough.

LABEL: 0x883E
STRING: Our eyes met, and we stared at each other.

LABEL: 0x8868
STRING: There was doubt and hesitation in her eyes, and...

LABEL: 0x88C3
STRING: 「...Please, forgive me.」

LABEL: 0x88EA
STRING: Yukari whispered softly, looking guilty.

LABEL: 0x8918
STRING: Looking up at me again, I could tell from her face that she had made up her mind.

LABEL: 0x89D2
STRING: 「Now that we've come this far, let's talk.」

LABEL: 0x8A00
STRING: 「In order for us to leave this place alive...」

LABEL: 0x8A32
STRING: 「...let's not hide things anymore.」

LABEL: 0x8AD6
STRING: When she raised her hand, the bracelet glowed azure, and the theater room's LCD screen reflected the deep sea in response to its color.

LABEL: 0x8B52
STRING: I couldn't see the expression on her face in the calm and faintly dark blue.

LABEL: 0x8BA7
STRING: 「――Seven years ago, on the 1st of August.」

LABEL: 0x8BCD
STRING: 「I, your sister, and the leader and pilot, Ryuuzen Haruki...」

LABEL: 0x8C45
STRING: 「The three of us dove into this dark bay.」

LABEL: 0x8C7B
STRING: 「Of course, we used a smaller submarine at the time.」

LABEL: 0x8CC3
STRING: 「The ship carried enough supplies to last for four days.」

LABEL: 0x8D01
STRING: 「...That submarine was the beginning of the <SHEEP> project.」

LABEL: 0x8D7E
STRING: 「It was an old-fashioned and compact ship,

LABEL: 0x8DA8
STRING: with windows that condensed quickly and which used detachable steel-plate weights to float.」

LABEL: 0x8E06
STRING: 「Still, it was a state-of-the-art ship at the time.」

LABEL: 0x8E40
STRING: 「The missions assigned to us and our submarine were diverse.」

LABEL: 0x8E8A
STRING: 「Observing and retrieving deep-sea creatures,」

LABEL: 0x8EB2
STRING: 「studying the dynamics of various gases in the deep sea,」

LABEL: 0x8F06
STRING: 「Our biggest mission was to retrieve "something" that had sunk to the bottom of the sea.」

LABEL: 0x8F4C
STRING: 「For that reason, the ship was also loaded with cutting-edge pressure-resistant diving suits.」

LABEL: 0x8FAF
STRING: Deep-sea exploration in a pressure-resistant submarine.

LABEL: 0x8FD9
STRING: Did they send just three researchers on a mission like that?

LABEL: 0x9017
STRING: Moreover, Yukari and my sister should still have been only graduate students.

LABEL: 0x904F
STRING: Either they expected too much from them, or...

LABEL: 0x9081
STRING: Maybe――

LABEL: 0x90AA
STRING: 「I was chosen to be in charge of the undersea exploration using the diving suits.」

LABEL: 0x90EE
STRING: 「And, at the bottom of the sea...」

LABEL: 0x9118
STRING: 「I witnessed it.」

LABEL: 0x9140
STRING: 「――That light...」

LABEL: 0x91E8
STRING: Light shone into the dark room.

LABEL: 0x920E
STRING: A figure rushed in through the open door.

LABEL: 0x923A
STRING: 「Touri...!」

LABEL: 0x9256
STRING: She ran in with a terrible look on her face and bent her sweaty upper body in the middle of the theater room.

LABEL: 0x92B2
STRING: Touri put her hands on her knees and panted heavily.

LABEL: 0x92E6
STRING: This disheveled state... Did something happen to Reiri again?

LABEL: 0x9390
STRING: 「Is everything okay, Touri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x9422
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei...!」

LABEL: 0x9447
STRING: She grabbed onto Hiragino's chest.

LABEL: 0x947E
STRING: 「What on Earth is going on?」

LABEL: 0x9518
STRING: 「Aahh..!」

LABEL: 0x956C
STRING: 「The window!」
